classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Ceremonial Objects
creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in form of a palm leaf; conventional animalistic heads carved on the suface after the manner of the Chow Period; handle is carved in form of dragons; carved wood base
title: Libation Cup with Base
